content_descriptors.notes: The game contains sexual episodes of illegal harassment of women on the tram, sexual acts, non-consensual sex, sexual assault, genital nudity, suicide scenes, etc. It is not suitable for all ages. All characters in this work are over 20 years old.

name: Train Capacity 300% Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 770 or AMD Radeon™ R9 Nano
  • Storage: 5 MB available space

short_description: Welcome to the molester's paradise that is a train packed to 300% capacity.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
